item.title: A Nightmare Unleashed: The Shocking Reality of Medical Identity Mix-ups
item.description: A few years ago, Painter Law Firm represented a woman in her 70s who lived in a Houston suburb. Let's refer to her as Sarah. Sarah was a delightful lady with a grandmotherly smile that brightened everyone's day. Prior to hiring our firm, she underwent abdominal surgery and was scheduled for a short stay in a skilled nursing facility (SNF) to recover and regain strength before returning home. Despite some hearing difficulties, Sarah led an independent life and was generally healthy.
